title: Feds investigating how DC National Guard shooter was radicalized in US: ‘Why he snapped?’
description: Rahmanullah Lakanwal passed security reviews both when he entered the US during President Biden’s disastrous withdrawal from Kabul in 2021 and again when he secured asylum under the Trump administration in April.
content: WASHINGTON Federal investigators are looking at whether the Afghan national accused of shooting two National Guard members in broad daylight was radicalized after arriving in the US despite clearing … [+4181 chars]
